purpose: The email announces two full-time, permanent lecturer/senior lecturer positions at Massey University in New Zealand, specifically within the School of Mathematical & Computational Sciences. The university is looking for candidates with expertise in AI, cybersecurity, software engineering, or human-computer interaction. The roles involve teaching, supervising students, and leading research initiatives.
evidence_sentences: The School of Mathematical & Computational Sciences at Massey University is seeking *two full-time, permanent* academic staff members to join the Computer Science and Information Technology group, based at our Albany Campus, Auckland.
We are interested in candidates with a research focus in AI, cybersecurity, software engineering, or human-computer interaction.
In this role, youâ€™ll provide high-quality teaching and supervision at undergraduate and postgraduate levels, both in-person and online.
You will also lead and contribute to an active research programme, including the supervision of Master's and PhD students, and pursue external research funding opportunities.
